> <OLD>
>
> "Everyone who wasnt an injure report to throne Roon, the Cyclonus and
> fractyl atten the injured and study the sample sf those things send me a
> report where you done and the injured ones go to CR. We need to plan the
> next move"

Cyclonus nodded and with a slight wince rose to his feet. "We shall
have everyone up as soon as we can." He said to Hydras.

"Including you too Cyclonus." Fractyl said, "You are in need of
repairs. Go slowly." He glanced over at Hydras, "I will send you a
report as soon as I know more." he said, his voice already destracted
as he looked over the injured, trying to decide who needed his help
first.

*     *     *     *     *

A few minutes later in Hydras' throne room many of Predacon soldiers
were already begining to arrive as per his orders.

Two of Hydras' long time soldier were among the first, Terrorsaur,
Waspinator, they looked somewhat out of sorts. They had been away for
quite some time and it was obvious that they had only recently
returned from other duties and other commanders, and they were still
unsure of this new form of Megatron called Hydras.

Then came the fuzors, the Predacons who's beast modes were
combinations of two different beasts at one: Skyshadow, thier leader
and then Injector, Buzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quickstrike, Quickstrike
being the most familiar to Hydras.

The last to arrive was Taratulus. He came striding in looking every
bit put off by this seeming intrusion on his time. He seemed surprised
at the number of soldier that appeared here and said nothing. Instead
he sat back as if biding his time, suddenly interested in all the new
things going on, and the new opportunities presenting themselves.

With all these soldier showing up, there were still others who may
have been out on patrols or are unavailable. However there are two who
did not appear nor check in: Jhiaxus and Scorponok.

As Hydras entered the room followed by Deepstryke, Blackrazor and
Phobia as well as Igunanus and then by Inferno, the room came to
attention. "We are yours to command mighty Hydras!" Sky Shadow said as
he came to the front and saluted. "What are your orders?"

(TAG)

Preston
